title: PHPtimezone_abbreviations_list()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPtimezone_abbreviations_list()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Print dst, offset, and timezone name for the "act" timezone:
<?php
$tzlist = DateTimeZone::listAbbreviations();
print_r($tzlist["acst"]);
?>

Definition and Usage
The timezone_abbreviations_list() returns an associative array containing dst, offset, and the timezone name.
Syntax
timezone_abbreviations_list()
Technical Details
Return Value:
Returns an associative array on success. FALSE on failure
PHP Version:
5.2+

★
+1
